GEN_C^ # in user model
def self.generate_session_token; SecureRandom::urlsafe_base64(16); end^ GEN

ENSURE_C^ # in user model
# and don\'t forget to call this after initialize
def ensure_session_token
  self.session_token ||= User.generate_session_token
end^ ENSURE

RESET_C^ # in user model
def reset_session_token!
  self.session_token = User.generate_session_token
  self.save
  self.session_token
end^ RESET
